# RStudio

| Keyboard shorcut | What it does                |
|------------------|-----------------------------|
| `⌘ ⇧ K`          | Render the current document |
| `⌘ ⌥ I`          | New R code chunk            |
| `^ 1`            | Go to source pane           |
| `^ 2`            | Go to console pane          |
|                  |                             |

::: {.callout-tip collapse="true"}
## How did I type ⌘ and other symbols?

Open symbols panel: `⌘ ^ ␣`

| Symbol | Name                |
|--------|---------------------|
| ⌘      | place of interest   |
| ⇧      | upwards white arrow |
| ⌥      | option              |
| ␣      | open box            |
:::
